description: Zach Alexander returns to Naked Kombat to increase his record of 1:0. He is hairy and looking more ripped than ever. He is feeling very strong and intends to wear his opponent down and then go in for the kill. His opponent this time around is Micah Andrews, a novice to Naked Kombat. He is smooth and solid. He feels that his previous MMA fighting experience will be enough to carry him through to his first win. His strategy is to remain in control and to finish on top. Who will get fucked and humiliated this time, the new guy or the returning champion?
title: Zach Alexander vs Micah Andrews
